name: Gyudon
recipeInstructions: 1. To poach the eggs, put them in a small saucepan and cover with boiling water. Put on the lid, and leave for 20 minutes. Remove and place into iced water.
2. To par-boil the beef, bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil and add the beef. When the beef loses its red colour remove and drain well.
3. Add the sake, mirin, soy sauce, and sugar to a medium frying pan. Turn on the heat and stir the mixture at medium heat until it starts to boil.
4. Add the beef and stir to coat the beef with the sauce. after a minute remove the beef.
5. Add the dashi stock, grated ginger and onion to the mixture, stir and cover. When the liquid starts to boil reduce the heat to low and cook for 5 more minutes.
6. Remove the lid and add the beef and warm though.
7. Put the rice in a bowl and add the beef and juices.
